name: Last Cube Standing (Kyle Martin)
description:
Use WASD or arrows to move.

In this game, your only goal is to survive as long as you can (because you will die eventually).  Go near red cubes to slow the constant decay of your health and stay far away from purple cubes to avoid speeding it up.  If you are lucky, you'll bump into a green cube and get a health boost!

Music by Eric Matyas @ soundimage.org
